changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_relationship') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_relationship GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_relationship @owner_id dbo.id_t, @target_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM Guild_Relationship_Infos WHERE owner_id = @owner_id AND target_id = @target_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild_relationship') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild_relationship GO
